participant_1.background:
I am doing my best in school, but it is hard to stay focused.
i have a pug named corky.
i am saving money to buy my first car.
I'm not sure if I'll be programming this weekend, but I'll definitely be enjoying my morning coffee.

participant_2.background:
My boss doesn't know that I'm an art student, but I'm hoping to show him my portfolio soon.
My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK.
dancing is my passion.
I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive.
I get to show off my long fingernails.

content.text: Hi, I'm learning to program with Python.
I'm an art student, but I'm thinking of learning to program too.
What kind of art do you do?
I love dancing, I'm trying to get into painting too.
Dancing, that's cool! I do some photography as a hobby, but I don't have much talent for it.
That's great! I don't have a lot of opportunity to take pictures, but I love taking dance pictures when I can.
What's your favorite type of dance?
I love contemporary and hip hop, but I'm trying to learn a bunch of different styles.
Cool! I've always wanted to try hip hop. What's your favorite thing about dancing?
I love the feeling of freedom and expression. It's a great way to relieve stress and have fun.
I can understand that. I love photography for the same reason.
What's your favorite thing about photography?
I love being able to capture moments and share them with others. I also love the creative process of taking pictures.
That's great! I love the creative process of dancing too
